label: 文楽
本: Osaka: The Merchants' Capital of Early Modern Japan . Cornell University Press . 1999
著者: McClain, James L.  and Wakita Osamu
説明文: theater, puppet.Commonly used to refer to professional puppet theater, the term derives from the name of a puppet theater established by Uemura Bunrakuken in Osaka at the beginning of the nineteenth century. Also, jōruri.
